Text

Not for the first time , an argument had broken out over breakfast at number four , [Privet Drive]1-privet drive . [Mr. Vernon Dursley]83-mr. vernon dursley had been woken in the early hours of the morning by a loud , hooting noise from [[his]83-mr. vernon dursley nephew]313-his nephew [[Harry]84-harry ’s room]314-harry ’s room .

“ Third time this week ! ”[83-mr. vernon dursley] [he]83-mr. vernon dursley roared across the table . “ If [you]83-mr. vernon dursley ca n’t control that owl , it ’ll have to go ! ”[83-mr. vernon dursley]

[Harry]84-harry tried , yet again , to explain .

“ [She]2065-she ’s bored , ”[84-harry] [he]84-harry said . “ [She]2065-she ’s used to flying around outside . If [I]84-harry could just let [her]2065-she out at night — ”[84-harry]

“ Do [I]85-uncle vernon look stupid ? ”[85-uncle vernon] snarled [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon , a bit of fried egg dangling from [his]85-uncle vernon bushy mustache . “ [I]85-uncle vernon know what ’ll happen if that owl ’s let out . ”[85-uncle vernon]

[He]85-uncle vernon exchanged dark looks with [[his]85-uncle vernon wife]315-his wife , [Petunia]86-aunt petunia .

[Harry]84-harry tried to argue back but [his]84-harry words were drowned by a long , loud belch from [[the Dursleys]87-the dursleys ’ son]316-the dursleys ’ son , [Dudley]88-dudley .

“ [I]84-harry want more bacon . ”[84-harry]

“ There ’s more in the frying pan , sweetums , ”[86-aunt petunia] said [Aunt Petunia]86-aunt petunia , turning misty eyes on [[her]86-aunt petunia massive son]317-her massive son . “ [We]2066-we must build [you]317-her massive son up while [we]2066-we ’ve got the chance ... [I]86-aunt petunia do n’t like the sound of that school food ... ”[86-aunt petunia]

“ Nonsense , [Petunia]86-aunt petunia , [I]85-uncle vernon never went hungry when [I]85-uncle vernon was at [Smeltings]2-smeltings , ”[85-uncle vernon] said [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon heartily . “ [Dudley]88-dudley gets enough , do n’t [you]84-harry , [son]2067-son ? ”[85-uncle vernon]

[Dudley]88-dudley , who was so large [his]88-dudley bottom drooped over either side of the kitchen chair , grinned and turned to [Harry]84-harry .

“ Pass the frying pan . ”[85-uncle vernon]

“ [You]88-dudley ’ve forgotten the magic word , ”[84-harry] said [Harry]84-harry irritably .

The effect of this simple sentence on [the rest of [the family]319-the family]318-the rest of the family was incredible : [Dudley]88-dudley gasped and fell off [his]88-dudley chair with a crash that shook [the whole kitchen]320-the whole kitchen ; [Mrs. Dursley]89-mrs. dursley gave a small scream and clapped [her]89-mrs. dursley hands to [her]89-mrs. dursley mouth ; [Mr. Dursley]83-mr. vernon dursley jumped to [his]83-mr. vernon dursley feet , veins throbbing in [his]83-mr. vernon dursley temples .

“ [I]84-harry meant ‘ please ’ ! ”[84-harry] said [Harry]84-harry quickly . “ [I]84-harry did n’t mean — ”[84-harry]

“ WHAT HAVE [I]321-his uncle TOLD [YOU]84-harry , ”[321-his uncle] thundered [[his]83-mr. vernon dursley uncle]321-his uncle , spraying spit over the table , “ ABOUT SAYING THE ‘ M ’ WORD IN [[OUR]2068-our HOUSE]2069-our house ? ”[321-his uncle]

“ But [I]84-harry — ”[84-harry]

“ HOW DARE [YOU]84-harry THREATEN [DUDLEY]88-dudley ! ”[85-uncle vernon] roared [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon , pounding the table with [his]85-uncle vernon fist .

“ [I]84-harry just — ”[84-harry]

“ [I]85-uncle vernon WARNED [YOU]84-harry ! [I]85-uncle vernon WILL NOT TOLERATE MENTION OF [YOUR]84-harry ABNORMALITY UNDER THIS ROOF ! ”[85-uncle vernon]

[Harry]84-harry stared from [[his]84-harry purple - faced uncle]322-his purple - faced uncle to [[his]84-harry pale aunt , who was trying to heave [Dudley]88-dudley to [his]88-dudley feet]323-his pale aunt , who was trying to heave dudley to his feet .

“ All right , ”[84-harry] said [Harry]84-harry , “ all right ... ”[84-harry]

[Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon sat back down , breathing like a winded rhinoceros and watching [Harry]84-harry closely out of the corners of [his]85-uncle vernon small , sharp eyes .

Ever since [Harry]84-harry had come [home]324-home for the summer holidays , [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon had been treating [him]84-harry like a bomb that might go off at any moment , because [Harry Potter]84-harry was n’t [a normal boy]325-a normal boy . As a matter of fact , [he]84-harry was as not normal as it is possible to be .

[Harry Potter]84-harry was [a wizard]326-a wizard — [a wizard fresh from [his]84-harry first year at [Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry]328-hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry]327-a wizard fresh from his first year at hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry . And if [the Dursleys]87-the dursleys were unhappy to have [him]84-harry back for the holidays , it was nothing to how [Harry]84-harry felt .

[He]84-harry missed [Hogwarts]3-hogwarts so much it was like having a constant stomachache . [He]84-harry missed [the castle]329-the castle , with [its]329-the castle secret passageways and ghosts , [his]84-harry classes ( though perhaps not [Snape]90-snape , [the Potions master]330-the potions master ) , the mail arriving by owl , eating banquets in [the Great Hall]331-the great hall , sleeping in [his]84-harry four - poster bed in [the tower dormitory]332-the tower dormitory , visiting [the gamekeeper]333-the gamekeeper , [Hagrid]91-hagrid , in [[his]333-the gamekeeper cabin next to [the Forbidden Forest in [the grounds]336-the grounds]335-the forbidden forest in the grounds]334-his cabin next to the forbidden forest in the grounds , and , especially , Quidditch , the most popular sport in [the Wizarding world]337-the wizarding world ( six tall goalposts , four flying balls , and [fourteen players on broomsticks )]338-fourteen players on broomsticks ) .

All [Harry]84-harry ’s spellbooks , [his]84-harry wand , robes , cauldron , and top - of - the - line Nimbus Two Thousand broomstick had been locked in a cupboard under the stairs by [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon the instant [Harry]84-harry had come [home]324-home . What did [the Dursleys]87-the dursleys care if [Harry]84-harry lost [his]84-harry place on [the House Quidditch team]340-the house quidditch team because [he]84-harry had n’t practiced all summer ? What was it to [the Dursleys]87-the dursleys if [Harry]84-harry went back to [school]341-school without any of [his]84-harry homework done ? [The Dursleys]87-the dursleys were what [wizards]342-wizards called [Muggles]92-muggles ( not a drop of magical blood in [their]342-wizards veins ) , and as far as [they]342-wizards were concerned , having [a wizard]326-a wizard in [the family]319-the family was a matter of deepest shame . [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon had even padlocked [Harry]84-harry ’s owl , [Hedwig]93-hedwig , inside [[her]93-hedwig cage]345-her cage , to stop [her]93-hedwig from carrying messages to [anyone in [the Wizarding world]337-the wizarding world]346-anyone in the wizarding world .

[Harry]84-harry looked nothing like [the rest of [the family]319-the family]318-the rest of the family . [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon was large and neckless , with an enormous black mustache ; [Aunt Petunia]86-aunt petunia was horse - faced and bony ; [Dudley]88-dudley was blond , pink , and porky . [Harry]84-harry , on the other hand , was small and skinny , with brilliant green eyes and jet - black hair that was always untidy . [He]84-harry wore round glasses , and on [his]84-harry forehead was a thin , lightning - shaped scar .

It was this scar that made [Harry]84-harry so particularly unusual , even for [a wizard]326-a wizard . This scar was the only hint of [Harry]84-harry ’s very mysterious past , of the reason [he]84-harry had been left on [the Dursleys]87-the dursleys ’ doorstep eleven years before .

At the age of one year old , [Harry]84-harry had somehow survived a curse from [the greatest Dark sorcerer of all time]351-the greatest dark sorcerer of all time , [Lord Voldemort]94-lord voldemort , whose name [most witches]352-most witches and [wizards still feared to speak]353-wizards still feared to speak . [[Harry]84-harry ’s parents]354-harry ’s parents had died in [Voldemort]94-lord voldemort ’s attack , but [Harry]84-harry had escaped with [his]84-harry lightning scar , and somehow — [nobody]355-nobody understood why — [Voldemort]94-lord voldemort ’s powers had been destroyed the instant [he]94-lord voldemort had failed to kill [Harry]84-harry .

So [Harry]84-harry had been brought up by [[his]84-harry dead mother ’s sister and [[her]357-her husband]358-her husband]356-his dead mother ’s sister and her husband . [He]84-harry had spent ten years with [the Dursleys]87-the dursleys , never understanding why [he]84-harry kept making odd things happen without meaning to , believing [the Dursleys]87-the dursleys ’ story that [he]84-harry had got [his]84-harry scar in the car crash that had killed [[his]84-harry parents]359-his parents .

And then , exactly a year ago , [Hogwarts]95-hogwarts had written to [Harry]84-harry , and the whole story had come out . [Harry]84-harry had taken up [his]84-harry place at [wizard school]360-wizard school , where [he]84-harry and [his]84-harry scar were famous ... but now the school year was over , and [he]84-harry was back with [the Dursleys]87-the dursleys for the summer , back to being treated like a dog that had rolled in something smelly .

[The Dursleys]87-the dursleys had n’t even remembered that today happened to be [Harry]84-harry ’s twelfth birthday . Of course , [his]84-harry hopes had n’t been high ; [they]361-they ’d never given [him]84-harry a real present , let alone a cake — but to ignore it completely ...

At that moment , [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon cleared [his]85-uncle vernon throat importantly and said , “ Now , as [we]2070-we all know , today is a very important day . ”[85-uncle vernon]

[Harry]84-harry looked up , hardly daring to believe it .

“ This could well be the day [I]85-uncle vernon make the biggest deal of [my]85-uncle vernon career , ”[85-uncle vernon] said [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon .

[Harry]84-harry went back to [his]84-harry toast . Of course , [he]84-harry thought bitterly , [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon was talking about the stupid dinner party . [He]85-uncle vernon ’d been talking of nothing else for two weeks . [Some rich builder]362-some rich builder and [[his]362-some rich builder wife]315-his wife were coming to dinner and [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon was hoping to get a huge order from [him]362-some rich builder ( [[Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon ’s company]364-uncle vernon ’s company made drills ) .

“ [I]85-uncle vernon think [we]2070-we should run through the schedule one more time , ”[85-uncle vernon] said [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon . “ [We]2070-we should all be in position at eight o’clock . [Petunia]86-aunt petunia , [you]86-aunt petunia will be — ? ”[85-uncle vernon]

“ In [the lounge]2071-the lounge , ”[86-aunt petunia] said [Aunt Petunia]86-aunt petunia promptly , “ waiting to welcome [them]2072-them graciously to [[our]2070-we home]2073-our home . ”[86-aunt petunia]

“ Good , good . And [Dudley]88-dudley ? ”[85-uncle vernon]

“ [I]88-dudley ’ll be waiting to open the door . ”[88-dudley] [Dudley]88-dudley put on a foul , simpering smile . “ May [I]88-dudley take [your]86-aunt petunia coats , [Mr.]2074-mr. and [Mrs. Mason]96-mrs. mason ? ”[88-dudley]

“ [They]2072-them ’ll love [him]88-dudley ! ”[86-aunt petunia] cried [Aunt Petunia]86-aunt petunia rapturously .

“ Excellent , [Dudley]88-dudley , ”[85-uncle vernon] said [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon . Then [he]85-uncle vernon rounded on [Harry]84-harry . “ And [you]84-harry ? ”[85-uncle vernon]

“ [I]84-harry ’ll be in [[my]84-harry bedroom]2075-my bedroom , making no noise and pretending [I]84-harry ’m not there , ”[84-harry] said [Harry]84-harry tonelessly .

“ Exactly , ”[85-uncle vernon] said [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon nastily . “ [I]85-uncle vernon will lead [them]2072-them into [the lounge]2071-the lounge , introduce [you]84-harry , [Petunia]86-aunt petunia , and pour [them]2072-them drinks . At eight - fifteen — ”[85-uncle vernon]

“ [I]86-aunt petunia ’ll announce dinner , ”[86-aunt petunia] said [Aunt Petunia]86-aunt petunia .

“ And , [Dudley]88-dudley , [you]88-dudley ’ll say — ”[86-aunt petunia]

“ May [I]88-dudley take [you]88-dudley through to [the dining room]2077-the dining room , [Mrs. Mason]96-mrs. mason ? ”[88-dudley] said [Dudley]88-dudley , offering [his]88-dudley fat arm to [an invisible woman]365-an invisible woman .

“ [[My]86-aunt petunia perfect [little gentleman]2079-little gentleman]2078-my perfect little gentleman ! ”[86-aunt petunia] sniffed [Aunt Petunia]86-aunt petunia .

“ And [you]84-harry ? ”[85-uncle vernon] said [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon viciously to [Harry]84-harry .

“ [I]84-harry ’ll be in [[my]84-harry room]2080-my room , making no noise and pretending [I]84-harry ’m not [there]2081-there , ”[84-harry] said [Harry]84-harry dully .

“ Precisely . Now , [we]2082-we should aim to get in a few good compliments at dinner . [Petunia]86-aunt petunia , any ideas ? ”[84-harry]

“ [Vernon]85-uncle vernon tells [me]86-aunt petunia [you]84-harry ’re [a wonderful golfer]2083-a wonderful golfer , [Mr. Mason]97-mr. mason ... Do tell [me]86-aunt petunia where [you]84-harry bought [your]84-harry dress , [Mrs. Mason]96-mrs. mason ... ”[86-aunt petunia]

“ [Perfect ... Dudley]88-dudley ? ”[84-harry]

“ How about — ‘ [We]2082-we had to write an essay about [[our]2082-we hero]2084-our hero at [school]341-school , [Mr. Mason]97-mr. mason , and [I]86-aunt petunia wrote about [you]84-harry . ’ ”[86-aunt petunia]

“ Happy birthday to [me]84-harry ... happy birthday to [me]84-harry ... ”[84-harry]

No cards , no presents , and [he]84-harry would be spending the evening pretending not to exist . [He]84-harry gazed miserably into the hedge . [He]84-harry had never felt so lonely . “ [He]8-vol- has n’t got [a brother]2151-a brother , has [he]8-vol- ? ”[104-dobby]

[Dobby]104-dobby shook [his]104-dobby head , [his]104-dobby eyes wider than ever .

“ Well then , [I]84-harry ca n’t think who else would have a chance of making horrible things happen at [Hogwarts]3-hogwarts , ”[84-harry] said [Harry]84-harry . “ [I]84-harry mean , there ’s [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore , for one thing — [you]2107-sir know who [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore is , do n’t [you]2107-sir ? ”[84-harry]

[Dobby]104-dobby bowed [his]104-dobby head .

“ [Albus Dumbledore]107-dumbledore is [the greatest headmaster [Hogwarts]3-hogwarts has ever had]2152-the greatest headmaster hogwarts has ever had . [Dobby]104-dobby knows it , [sir]2107-sir . And before [Harry]84-harry could stop [him]104-dobby , [Dobby]104-dobby bounded off the bed , seized [Harry]84-harry ’s desk lamp , and started beating [himself]104-dobby around the head with earsplitting yelps .

A sudden silence fell [downstairs]399-downstairs . Two seconds later [Harry]84-harry , heart thudding madly , heard [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon coming into [the hall]393-the hall , calling , “ [Dudley]88-dudley must have left [his]88-dudley television on again , the little tyke ! ”[85-uncle vernon]

“ What — the — devil — are — [you]104-dobby — doing ? ”[85-uncle vernon] said [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon through gritted teeth , [his]85-uncle vernon face horribly close to [Harry]84-harry ’s . “ [You]104-dobby ’ve just ruined the punch line of [my]85-uncle vernon Japanese golfer joke ... [Dobby]104-dobby shuffled [his]104-dobby feet .

“ [Harry Potter]84-harry must n’t be angry with [Dobby]104-dobby . [Dobby]104-dobby did it for the best — ”[104-dobby]

Before [Harry]84-harry could move , [Dobby]104-dobby had darted to the bedroom door , pulled it open , and sprinted down the stairs .

Mouth dry , stomach lurching , [Harry]84-harry sprang after [him]104-dobby , trying not to make a sound . [He]84-harry jumped the last six steps , landing catlike on the hall carpet , looking around for [Dobby]104-dobby . From [the dining room]2077-the dining room [he]84-harry heard [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon saying , “ . . . tell [Petunia]86-aunt petunia that very funny story about [those American plumbers]2169-those american plumbers , [Mr. Mason]97-mr. mason . [Harry]84-harry ran up [the hall]393-the hall into [the kitchen]414-the kitchen and felt [his]84-harry stomach disappear .

[Aunt Petunia]86-aunt petunia ’s masterpiece of a pudding , the mountain of cream and sugared violets , was floating up near the ceiling . On top of a cupboard in the corner crouched [Dobby]104-dobby .

The pudding fell to the floor with a heart - stopping crash . Cream splattered the windows and walls as the dish shattered . With a crack like a whip , [Dobby]104-dobby vanished .

There were screams from [the dining room]2077-the dining room and [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon burst into [the kitchen]414-the kitchen to find [Harry]84-harry , rigid with shock , covered from head to foot in [Aunt Petunia]86-aunt petunia ’s pudding .

At first , it looked as though [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon would manage to gloss the whole thing over . ( “ Just [[our]85-uncle vernon nephew]2173-our nephew — very disturbed — meeting [strangers]2174-strangers upsets [him]2173-our nephew , so [we]85-uncle vernon kept [him]2173-our nephew [upstairs]2103-upstairs ... ”[85-uncle vernon] ) [He]85-uncle vernon shooed [the shocked Masons]417-the shocked masons back into [the dining room]2077-the dining room , promised [Harry]84-harry [he]85-uncle vernon would flay [him]84-harry to within an inch of [his]84-harry life when [the Masons]2089-the masons had left , and handed [him]84-harry a mop . [Aunt Petunia]86-aunt petunia dug some ice cream out of the freezer and [Harry]84-harry , still shaking , started scrubbing [the kitchen]414-the kitchen clean .

[Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon might still have been able to make [his]85-uncle vernon deal — if it had n’t been for the owl .

[Aunt Petunia]86-aunt petunia was just passing around a box of after - dinner mints when a huge barn owl swooped through [the dining room]2077-the dining room window , dropped a letter on [Mrs. Mason]96-mrs. mason ’s head , and swooped out again . [Mrs. Mason]96-mrs. mason screamed like a banshee and ran from [the house]2099-the house shouting about [lunatics]423-lunatics . [Mr. Mason]97-mr. mason stayed just long enough to tell [the Dursleys]87-the dursleys that [[his]97-mr. mason wife]315-his wife was mortally afraid of birds of all shapes and sizes , and to ask whether this was [their]2089-the masons idea of a joke .

[Harry]84-harry stood in [the kitchen]414-the kitchen , clutching the mop for support , as [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon advanced on [him]84-harry , a demonic glint in [his]85-uncle vernon tiny eyes .

“ Read it ! ”[85-uncle vernon] [he]85-uncle vernon hissed evilly , brandishing the letter the owl had delivered . “ Go on — read it ! ”[85-uncle vernon]

[Harry]84-harry took it . It did not contain birthday greetings .

[Dear Mr. Potter]108-mr. potter ,

[We]426-we have received intelligence that a Hover Charm was used at [[your]108-mr. potter place of residence]427-your place of residence this evening at twelve minutes past nine .

As [you]108-mr. potter know , [underage wizards]372-underage wizards are not permitted to perform spells outside school , and further spellwork on [your]108-mr. potter part may lead to expulsion from [said school]429-said school ( Decree for the Reasonable Restriction of Underage Sorcery , 1875 , Paragraph C ) .

[We]426-we would also ask [you]108-mr. potter to remember that any magical activity that risks notice by [members of the non - magical community]430-members of the non - magical community ( [Muggles]92-muggles ) is a serious offense under section 13 of [the International Confederation of Warlocks ’ Statute of Secrecy]9-the international confederation of warlocks ’ statute of secrecy .

Enjoy [your]108-mr. potter holidays !

[Yours]108-mr. potter sincerely ,

[Mafalda Hopkirk]109-mafalda hopkirk

IMPROPER USE OF MAGIC [OFFICE

Ministry of Magic]431-office ministry of magic .

[Harry]84-harry looked up from the letter and gulped .

“ [You]84-harry did n’t tell [us]426-we [you]84-harry were n’t allowed to use magic outside [school]341-school , ”[85-uncle vernon] said [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon , a mad gleam dancing in [his]85-uncle vernon eyes . “ Forgot to mention it ... [He]85-uncle vernon was bearing down on [Harry]84-harry like a great bulldog , all [his]85-uncle vernon teeth bared . “ Well , [I]85-uncle vernon ’ve got news for [you]84-harry , [boy]2086-boy ... [I]85-uncle vernon ’m locking [you]84-harry up ... [You]84-harry ’re never going back to [that school]2178-that school ... never ... and if [you]84-harry try and magic [yourself]84-harry out — [they]434-a man ’ll expel [you]84-harry ! ”[85-uncle vernon]

And laughing like [a maniac]432-a maniac , [he]85-uncle vernon dragged [Harry]84-harry back [upstairs]2103-upstairs .

[Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon was as bad as [his]85-uncle vernon word . The following morning , [he]85-uncle vernon paid [a man]434-a man to fit bars on [Harry]84-harry ’s window . [He]85-uncle vernon [himself]85-uncle vernon fitted a cat - flap in the bedroom door , so that small amounts of food could be pushed inside three times a day . [They]435-they let [Harry]84-harry out to use [the bathroom]436-the bathroom morning and evening . Otherwise , [he]84-harry was locked in [[his]84-harry room]437-his room around the clock .

Three days later , [the Dursleys]87-the dursleys were showing no sign of relenting , and [Harry]84-harry could n’t see any way out of [his]84-harry situation . [He]84-harry lay on [his]84-harry bed watching the sun sinking behind the bars on the window and wondered miserably what was going to happen to [him]84-harry .

What was the good of magicking [himself]84-harry out of [[his]84-harry room]437-his room if [Hogwarts]95-hogwarts would expel [him]84-harry for doing it ? Yet life at [Privet Drive]1-privet drive had reached an all - time low . Now that [the Dursleys]87-the dursleys knew [they]435-they were n’t going to wake up as fruit bats , [he]84-harry had lost [his]84-harry only weapon . [Dobby]104-dobby might have saved [Harry]84-harry from horrible happenings at [Hogwarts]3-hogwarts , but the way things were going , [he]84-harry ’d probably starve to death anyway .

The cat - flap rattled and [Aunt Petunia]86-aunt petunia ’s hand appeared , pushing a bowl of canned soup into [the room]374-the room . [Harry]84-harry , whose insides were aching with hunger , jumped off [his]84-harry bed and seized it . The soup was stone - cold , but [he]84-harry drank half of it in one gulp . Then [he]84-harry crossed [the room]374-the room to [[Hedwig]93-hedwig ’s cage]371-hedwig ’s cage and tipped the soggy vegetables at the bottom of the bowl into [her]93-hedwig empty food tray . [She]93-hedwig ruffled [her]93-hedwig feathers and gave [him]84-harry a look of deep disgust .

“ It ’s no good turning [your]93-hedwig beak up at it — that ’s all [we]2179-we ’ve got , ”[84-harry] said [Harry]84-harry grimly .

[He]84-harry put the empty bowl back on the floor next to the cat - flap and lay back down on the bed , somehow even hungrier than [he]84-harry had been before the soup .

Supposing [he]84-harry was still alive in another four weeks , what would happen if [he]84-harry did n’t turn up at [Hogwarts]3-hogwarts ? Would [someone]388-someone be sent to see why [he]84-harry had n’t come back ? Would [they]388-someone be able to make [the Dursleys]87-the dursleys let [him]84-harry go ?

[The room]374-the room was growing dark . Exhausted , stomach rumbling , mind spinning over the same unanswerable questions , [Harry]84-harry fell into an uneasy sleep .

[He]84-harry dreamed that [he]84-harry was on show in [a zoo]444-a zoo , with a card reading [UNDERAGE WIZARD]445-underage wizard attached to [[his]84-harry cage]446-his cage . [He]84-harry opened [his]84-harry eyes . Moonlight was shining through the bars on the window . And [someone]388-someone was goggling through the bars at [him]84-harry : [a freckle - faced , red - haired , long - nosed someone]450-a freckle - faced , red - haired , long - nosed someone .

[Ron Weasley]99-ron was outside [Harry]84-harry ’s window .

“ [I]99-ron told [you]84-harry , [I]99-ron did n’t — but it ’ll take too long to explain now — look , can [you]84-harry tell [them]2186-them at [Hogwarts]3-hogwarts that [the Dursleys]87-the dursleys have locked [me]99-ron up and wo n’t let [me]99-ron come back , and obviously [I]99-ron ca n’t magic [myself]99-ron out , because [the Ministry’ll]112-the ministry’ll think that ’s the second spell [I]99-ron ’ve done in three days , so — ”[99-ron]

[Harry]84-harry moved back into the shadows next to [Hedwig]93-hedwig , who seemed to have realized how important this was and kept still and silent . [Harry]84-harry ran back to the window to see the bars dangling a few feet above the ground . Panting , [Ron]99-ron hoisted [them]456-them up into [the car]380-the car . “ So — [we]2189-a lot of wizards ’ll get [your]84-harry trunk — [you]84-harry grab anything [you]84-harry need from [[your]84-harry room]2191-your room and hand it out to [Ron]99-ron , ”[111-george] whispered [George]111-george .

[Fred]110-fred climbed back into [the car]380-the car to pull with [Ron]99-ron , and [Harry]84-harry and [George]111-george pushed from [the bedroom]470-the bedroom side . “ A bit more , ”[110-fred] panted [Fred]110-fred , who was pulling from inside [the car]380-the car . “ One good push — ”[110-fred]

But as [Harry]84-harry climbed onto the windowsill there came a sudden loud screech from behind [him]84-harry , followed immediately by the thunder of [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon ’s voice .

“ [THAT RUDDY OWL]2192-that ruddy owl ! ”[85-uncle vernon]

“ [I]85-uncle vernon ’ve forgotten [Hedwig]93-hedwig ! ”[85-uncle vernon]

[Harry]84-harry tore back across [the room]374-the room as the landing light clicked on — [he]84-harry snatched up [Hedwig]93-hedwig ’s cage , dashed to the window , and passed it out to [Ron]99-ron . [He]84-harry was scrambling back onto the chest of drawers when [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon hammered on the unlocked door — and it crashed open .

For a split second , [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon stood framed in the doorway ; then [he]85-uncle vernon let out a bellow like an angry bull and dived at [Harry]84-harry , grabbing [him]84-harry by the ankle .

[Ron]99-ron , [Fred]110-fred , and [George]111-george seized [Harry]84-harry ’s arms and pulled as hard as [they]475-they could .

“ [Petunia]86-aunt petunia ! ”[85-uncle vernon] roared [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon . “ [He]84-harry ’s getting away ! [HE]84-harry ’S GETTING AWAY ! ”[85-uncle vernon]

But [the Weasleys]113-the weasleys gave a gigantic tug and [Harry]84-harry ’s leg slid out of [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon ’s grasp — [Harry]84-harry was in [the car]380-the car — [he]84-harry ’d slammed the door shut —

“ Put [your]84-harry foot down , [Fred]110-fred ! ”[99-ron] yelled [Ron]99-ron , and [the car]380-the car shot suddenly toward the moon .

[Harry]84-harry could n’t believe it — [he]84-harry was free . [He]84-harry rolled down the window , the night air whipping [his]84-harry hair , and looked back at [the shrinking rooftops of [Privet Drive]1-privet drive]478-the shrinking rooftops of privet drive . [Uncle Vernon]85-uncle vernon , [Aunt Petunia]86-aunt petunia , and [Dudley]88-dudley were all hanging , dumbstruck , out of [Harry]84-harry ’s window .

“ See [you]99-ron next summer ! ”[84-harry] [Harry]84-harry yelled .

“ [Gerroff]131-gerroff [me]518-the gnome ! Gerroff [me]518-the gnome ! ”[518-the gnome] squealed [the gnome]518-the gnome .

It was certainly nothing like [Santa Claus]132-santa claus . [It]518-the gnome was small and leathery looking , with a large , knobby , bald head exactly like a potato . [Ron]99-ron held it at arm ’s length as it kicked out at [him]99-ron with its horny little feet ; [he]99-ron grasped it around the ankles and turned it upside down .

“ This is what [you]84-harry have to do , ”[99-ron] [he]99-ron said . And [they]711-they both pretended not to notice the whining growing louder and louder as the sky became steadily darker . Stars were blossoming in the blackness . [Ron]99-ron let go of the steering wheel completely and pulled [his]99-ron wand out of [his]99-ron back pocket —

CRUNCH .

With an earsplitting bang of metal on wood , [they]711-they hit the thick tree trunk and dropped to the ground with a heavy jolt . Steam was billowing from under the crumpled hood ; [Hedwig]93-hedwig was shrieking in terror ; a golf - ball - sized lump was throbbing on [Harry]84-harry ’s head where [he]84-harry had hit the windshield ; and to [his]99-ron right , [Ron]99-ron let out a low , despairing groan .

“ Are [you]84-harry okay ? ”[84-harry] [Harry]84-harry said urgently .

“ [My]99-ron wand , ”[99-ron] said [Ron]99-ron , in a shaky voice . “ Look at [my]99-ron wand — ”[99-ron]

[It]759-it had snapped , almost in two ; the tip was dangling limply , held on by a few splinters .

[Harry]84-harry opened [his]84-harry mouth to say [he]84-harry was sure [they]711-they ’d be able to mend it up at [the school]760-the school , but [he]84-harry never even got started . “ What ’s happen — ? ”[99-ron]

[Ron]99-ron gasped , staring through the windshield , and [Harry]84-harry looked around just in time to see a branch as thick as a python smash into it . [Its]762-its trunk was bent almost double , and its gnarled boughs were pummeling every inch of [the car]380-the car [it]762-its could reach .

“ Aaargh ! ”[99-ron] said [Ron]99-ron as another twisted limb punched a large dent into [his]99-ron door ; the windshield was now trembling under a hail of blows from knuckle - like twigs and a branch as thick as a battering ram was pounding furiously on the roof , which seemed to be caving —

“ Run for it ! ”[99-ron] [Ron]99-ron shouted , throwing [his]99-ron full weight against [his]99-ron door , but next second [he]99-ron had been knocked backward into [Harry]84-harry ’s lap by a vicious uppercut from another branch .

[The car]380-the car , however , had reached the end of its tether . “ Can [you]84-harry believe [our]771-we luck ? ”[99-ron] said [Ron]99-ron miserably , bending down to pick up Scabbers . “ Of all the trees [we]771-we could ’ve hit , [we]771-we had to get one that hits back . ”[99-ron]

“ [I]99-ron think the feast ’s already started , ”[99-ron] said [Ron]99-ron , dropping [his]99-ron trunk at the foot of the front steps and crossing quietly to look through a brightly lit window . “ Hey — [Harry]84-harry — come and look — it ’s [the Sorting]2420-the sorting ! ”[99-ron]

[Harry]84-harry hurried over and , together , [he]84-harry and [Ron]99-ron peered in at [the Great Hall]331-the great hall .

Innumerable candles were hovering in midair over four long , crowded tables , making the golden plates and goblets sparkle . Overhead , the bewitched ceiling , which always mirrored the sky outside , sparkled with stars .

Through the forest of pointed black Hogwarts hats , [Harry]84-harry saw a long line of scared - looking first years filing into [the Hall]393-the hall . [Ginny]128-ginny was among [them]771-we , easily visible because of [her]128-ginny vivid Weasley hair . Meanwhile , [Professor McGonagall]158-professor mcgonagall , [a bespectacled witch with [her]158-professor mcgonagall hair in a tight bun]775-a bespectacled witch with her hair in a tight bun , was placing the famous Hogwarts Sorting Hat on a stool before [the newcomers]776-the newcomers .

Every year , this aged old hat , patched , frayed , and dirty , sorted [new students]777-new students into the four [Hogwarts Houses]36-hogwarts houses ( [Gryffindor]37-gryffindor , [Hufflepuff]244-hufflepuff , [Ravenclaw]159-ravenclaw , and [Slytherin]160-slytherin ) . [Harry]84-harry well remembered putting it on , exactly one year ago , and waiting , petrified , for its decision as it muttered aloud in [his]84-harry ear . For a few horrible seconds [he]84-harry had feared that the hat was going to put [him]84-harry in [Slytherin]160-slytherin , [the House that had turned out more [Dark witches]779-dark witches and [wizards]342-wizards]778-the house that had turned out more dark witches and wizards than any other — but [he]84-harry had ended up in [Gryffindor]37-gryffindor , along with [Ron]99-ron , [Hermione]100-hermione , and [the rest of [the Weasleys]113-the weasleys]650-the rest of the weasleys . Last term , [Harry]84-harry and [Ron]99-ron had helped [Gryffindor]148-gryffindor win the House Championship , beating [Slytherin]160-slytherin for the first time in seven years .

[A very small , mousy - haired boy]782-a very small , mousy - haired boy had been called forward to place the hat on [his]782-a very small , mousy - haired boy head . [Harry]84-harry ’s eyes wandered past [him]782-a very small , mousy - haired boy to where [Professor Dumbledore]106-dumbledore , [the headmaster]783-the headmaster , sat watching the Sorting from the staff table , [his]106-dumbledore long silver beard and half - moon glasses shining brightly in the candlelight . “ [Mail]170-mail ’s due any minute — [I]169-neville think [Gran]171-gran ’s sending a few things [I]169-neville forgot . ”[169-neville]

[Harry]84-harry had only just started [his]84-harry porridge when , sure enough , there was a rushing sound overhead and a hundred or so owls streamed in , circling [the hall]393-the hall and dropping letters and packages into [the chattering crowd]845-the chattering crowd . [The rest of [the Gryffindor team]937-the gryffindor team]936-the rest of the gryffindor team were already in [the changing room]938-the changing room . “ [I]91-hagrid ’m on’y jokin ’ , ”[91-hagrid] [he]91-hagrid said , patting [Harry]84-harry genially on the back and sending [him]84-harry face first into the table . “ [I]91-hagrid knew [yeh]84-harry had n’t really . [Harry]84-harry had never been inside [[Filch]212-filch ’s office]1029-filch ’s office before ; it was [a place [most students]1031-most students avoided]1030-a place most students avoided . [He]212-filch retrieved a large roll of parchment from [his]212-filch desk drawer and stretched it out in front of [him]212-filch , dipping [his]212-filch long black quill into the ink pot .

“ Name ... [Harry Potter]84-harry . Crime ... ”[212-filch]

“ [PEEVES]225-peeves ! ”[212-filch] [Filch]212-filch roared , flinging down [his]212-filch quill in a transport of rage . “ [I]212-filch ’ll have [you]225-peeves this time , [I]212-filch ’ll have [you]225-peeves ! ”[212-filch]

And without a backward glance at [Harry]84-harry , [Filch]212-filch ran flat - footed from [the office]2232-the office , [Mrs. Norris]224-mrs. norris streaking alongside [him]212-filch .

[Peeves]225-peeves was [the school poltergeist]1040-the school poltergeist , [a grinning , airborne menace who lived to cause havoc and distress]1041-a grinning , airborne menace who lived to cause havoc and distress . KWIKSPELL

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

A Correspondence Course in Beginners ’ Magic

Intrigued , [Harry]84-harry flicked the envelope open and pulled out the sheaf of parchment inside . More curly silver writing on the front page said :

Feel out of step in [the world of modern magic]1042-the world of modern magic ? Find [yourself]1043-yourself making excuses not to perform simple spells ? Ever been taunted for [your]1043-yourself woeful wandwork ?

There is an answer !

Kwikspell is an all - new , fail - safe , quick - result , easy - learn course . [Hundreds of [witches]1045-witches and [wizards]342-wizards]1044-hundreds of witches and wizards have benefited from the Kwikspell method !

[Madam Z. Nettles of Topsham]226-madam z. nettles of topsham writes :

“ It ’s that voice again — shut up a minute — ”[84-harry]

“ Listen ! ”[84-harry] said [Harry]84-harry urgently , and [Ron]99-ron and [Hermione]100-hermione froze , watching [him]84-harry .

“ . . . kill [...]2671-... time to kill ... ”[84-harry]

The voice was growing fainter . [Harry]84-harry was sure it was moving away — moving upward . Was it [a phantom]1115-a phantom , to whom stone ceilings did n’t matter ?

“ This way , ”[84-harry] [he]84-harry shouted , and [he]84-harry began to run , up the stairs , into [the entrance hall]1112-the entrance hall . “ [Harry]84-harry , what ’re [we]2672-we — ”[99-ron]

“ [RON]99-ron ! ”[84-harry]

[Harry]84-harry woke early on Saturday morning and lay for a while thinking about the coming Quidditch match . [Harry]84-harry put on a burst of speed and zoomed toward the other end of the pitch . [He]84-harry could hear [the Bludger]255-the bludger whistling along behind [him]84-harry . What was going on ? WHAM .

[He]84-harry had stayed still a second too long . [The Bludger]255-the bludger had hit [him]84-harry at last , smashed into [his]84-harry elbow , and [Harry]84-harry felt [his]84-harry arm break . [Dobby]104-dobby smiled weakly .

“ This , [sir]2107-sir ? ”[104-dobby] said [Dobby]104-dobby , plucking at the pillowcase . “ ’ Tis a mark of [the house - elf]1276-the house - elf ’s enslavement , [sir]2107-sir . [The family]319-the family is careful not to pass [Dobby]104-dobby even a sock , [sir]2107-sir , for then [he]104-dobby would be free to leave [[their]319-the family house]2893-their house forever . ”[104-dobby]

[Dobby]104-dobby mopped [his]104-dobby bulging eyes and said suddenly , “ [Harry Potter]84-harry must go [home]324-home ! [Dobby]104-dobby thought [his]84-harry Bludger would be enough to make — ”[104-dobby]

[Harry]84-harry smiled feebly . Deliberately causing mayhem in [Snape]90-snape ’s Potions class was about as safe as poking a sleeping dragon in the eye .

Potions lessons took place in [one of [the large dungeons]1315-the large dungeons]1314-one of the large dungeons . Thursday afternoon ’s lesson proceeded in the usual way . [Twenty cauldrons]1316-twenty cauldrons stood steaming between the wooden desks , on which stood brass scales and jars of ingredients . [Harry]84-harry ’s Swelling Solution was far too runny , but [he]84-harry had [his]84-harry mind on more important things . [He]84-harry was waiting for [Hermione]100-hermione ’s signal , and [he]84-harry hardly listened as [Snape]90-snape paused to sneer at [his]90-snape watery potion . [Harry]84-harry ducked swiftly down behind [[his]84-harry cauldron]1320-his cauldron , pulled one of [Fred]110-fred ’s Filibuster fireworks out of [his]84-harry pocket , and gave it a quick prod with [his]84-harry wand . The firework began to fizz and sputter . Knowing [he]84-harry had only seconds , [Harry]84-harry straightened up , took aim , and lobbed it into the air ; it landed right on target in [[Goyle]187-goyle ’s cauldron]1321-goyle ’s cauldron .

[Goyle]187-goyle ’s potion exploded , showering [the whole class]905-the whole class . [People]2142-people shrieked as splashes of the Swelling Solution hit [them]2142-people . [Malfoy]101-malfoy got a faceful and [his]101-malfoy nose began to swell like a balloon ; [Goyle]187-goyle blundered around , [his]101-malfoy hands over [his]101-malfoy eyes , which had expanded to the size of a dinner plate — [Snape]90-snape was trying to restore calm and find out what had happened . Through the confusion , [Harry]84-harry saw [Hermione]100-hermione slip quietly into [[Snape]90-snape ’s office]797-snape ’s office .

“ Silence ! SILENCE ! ”[90-snape] [Snape]90-snape roared . “ [Anyone who has been splashed]2957-anyone who has been splashed , come here for [a Deflating Draught]2958-a deflating draught — when [I]90-snape find out who did this — ”[90-snape]

[Harry]84-harry tried not to laugh as [he]84-harry watched [Malfoy]101-malfoy hurry forward , [his]101-malfoy head drooping with the weight of a nose like a small melon . As [half the class]1325-half the class lumbered up to [[Snape]90-snape ’s desk]1326-snape ’s desk , some weighted down with arms like clubs , [others]1327-others unable to talk through gigantic puffed - up lips , [Harry]84-harry saw [Hermione]100-hermione slide back into [the dungeon]1070-the dungeon , the front of [her]100-hermione robes bulging .

When [everyone]2324-everyone had taken a swig of antidote and the various swellings had subsided , [Snape]90-snape swept over to [[Goyle]187-goyle ’s cauldron]1321-goyle ’s cauldron and scooped out the twisted black remains of the firework . There was a sudden hush .

[Harry]84-harry arranged [his]84-harry face into what [he]84-harry hoped was a puzzled expression . [Snape]90-snape was looking right at [him]84-harry , and the bell that rang ten minutes later could not have been more welcome .

[Harry]84-harry lay awake for hours that night . Through a gap in the curtains around [his]84-harry four - poster [he]84-harry watched snow starting to drift past the tower window and wondered ...

Could [he]84-harry be [a descendant of [Salazar Slytherin]160-slytherin]1374-a descendant of salazar slytherin ? [Harry]84-harry turned over . [The castle]329-the castle was darker than [it]329-the castle usually was in daytime because of the thick , swirling gray snow at every window . [Harry]84-harry blundered up [the corridor]1049-the corridor , barely noticing where [he]84-harry was going , [he]84-harry was in such a fury . The result was that [he]84-harry walked into something very large and solid , which knocked [him]84-harry backward onto the floor .

[Justin Finch - Fletchley]180-justin was lying on the floor , rigid and cold , a look of shock frozen on [his]180-justin face , [his]180-justin eyes staring blankly at the ceiling . “ Lemon drop ! ”[158-professor mcgonagall] [she]158-professor mcgonagall said . This was evidently a password , because the gargoyle sprang suddenly to life and hopped aside as the wall behind [him]262-ernie split in two . Even full of dread for what was coming , [Harry]84-harry could n’t fail to be amazed . Behind the wall was a spiral staircase that was moving smoothly upward , like an escalator . As [he]84-harry and [Professor McGonagall]158-professor mcgonagall stepped onto [it]1425-it , [Harry]84-harry heard the wall thud closed behind [them]1424-they . [They]1424-they rose upward in circles , higher and higher , until at last , slightly dizzy , [Harry]84-harry saw a gleaming oak door ahead , with a brass knocker in the shape of a griffin .

[He]84-harry knew now where [he]84-harry was being taken . This must be where [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore lived .

[They]1424-they stepped off the stone staircase at the top , and [Professor McGonagall]158-professor mcgonagall rapped on the door . It opened silently and [they]1424-they entered . [Professor McGonagall]158-professor mcgonagall told [Harry]84-harry to wait and left [him]84-harry there , alone .

[Harry]84-harry looked around . One thing was certain : of all [[the teachers]2348-the teachers ’ offices]1427-the teachers ’ offices [Harry]84-harry had visited so far this year , [[Dumbledore]106-dumbledore ’s]1428-dumbledore ’s was by far the most interesting . It was [a large and beautiful circular room , full of funny little noises]1430-a large and beautiful circular room , full of funny little noises . A number of curious silver instruments stood on spindle - legged tables , whirring and emitting little puffs of smoke . The walls were covered with portraits of [old headmasters]1431-old headmasters and [headmistresses]2761-headmistresses , all of whom were snoozing gently in [their]1433-their frames . There was also an enormous , claw - footed desk , and , sitting on a shelf behind [it]1428-dumbledore ’s , [a shabby , tattered wizard]1434-a shabby , tattered wizard ’s hat — the Sorting Hat .

[Harry]84-harry hesitated . [He]84-harry cast a wary eye around the sleeping witches and [wizards on the walls]1435-wizards on the walls . [He]84-harry walked quietly around the desk , lifted the hat from its shelf , and lowered it slowly onto [his]84-harry head . It was much too large and slipped down over [his]84-harry eyes , just as it had done the last time [he]84-harry ’d put it on . [Harry]84-harry stared at the black inside of the hat , waiting . Then a small voice said in [his]84-harry ear , “ [Bee]267-bee in [your]84-harry bonnet , [Harry Potter]84-harry ? ”[84-harry]

“ Er , yes , ”[84-harry] [Harry]84-harry muttered . “ Er — sorry to bother [you]84-harry — [I]84-harry wanted to ask — ”[84-harry]

“ [You]84-harry ’ve been wondering whether [I]84-harry put [you]84-harry in [the right House]1436-the right house , ”[84-harry] said the hat smartly . “ Yes ... [you]84-harry were particularly difficult to place . But [I]84-harry stand by what [I]84-harry said before ”[84-harry] — [Harry]84-harry ’s heart leapt — “ [you]84-harry would have done well in [Slytherin]160-slytherin — ”[84-harry]

[Harry]84-harry ’s stomach plummeted . [He]84-harry grabbed the point of the hat and pulled it off . It hung limply in [his]84-harry hand , grubby and faded . [Harry]84-harry pushed it back onto its shelf , feeling sick .

“ [You]84-harry ’re wrong , ”[84-harry] [he]84-harry said aloud to the still and silent hat . [It]1437-it did n’t move . [Harry]84-harry backed away , watching [it]1437-it . Then a strange , gagging noise behind [him]84-harry made [him]84-harry wheel around .

[He]84-harry was n’t alone after all . Standing on a golden perch behind the door was a decrepit - looking bird that resembled a half - plucked turkey . [Harry]84-harry stared at [it]1437-it and the bird looked balefully back , making [its]1437-it gagging noise again . [Harry]84-harry thought it looked very ill . [Its]1437-it eyes were dull and , even as [Harry]84-harry watched , a couple more feathers fell out of its tail .

[Harry]84-harry was just thinking that all [he]84-harry needed was for [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore ’s pet bird to die while [he]84-harry was alone in [the office]2232-the office with it , when the bird burst into flames .

[Harry]84-harry yelled in shock and backed away into the desk . [He]84-harry looked feverishly around in case there was a glass of water somewhere but could n’t see one ; the bird , meanwhile , had become a fireball ; it gave one loud shriek and next second there was nothing but a smoldering pile of ash on the floor .

[The office]2232-the office door opened . [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore came in , looking very somber .

“ [Professor]106-dumbledore , ”[84-harry] [Harry]84-harry gasped . “ [Your]106-dumbledore bird — [I]84-harry could n’t do anything — [he]1437-it just caught fire — ”[84-harry]

To [Harry]84-harry ’s astonishment , [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore smiled .

“ About time , too , ”[106-dumbledore] [he]106-dumbledore said . “ [He]1437-it ’s been looking dreadful for days ; [I]106-dumbledore ’ve been telling [him]1437-it to get a move on . ”[106-dumbledore]

[He]106-dumbledore chuckled at the stunned look on [Harry]84-harry ’s face .

“ [Fawkes]268-fawkes is a phoenix , [Harry]84-harry . [Phoenixes]3024-phoenixes burst into flame when it is time for [them]3024-phoenixes to die and are reborn from the ashes . Watch [him]1437-it ... ”[106-dumbledore]

[Harry]84-harry looked down in time to see a tiny , wrinkled , newborn bird poke its head out of the ashes . It was quite as ugly as [the old one]1440-the old one .

“ It ’s a shame [you]84-harry had to see [him]1437-it on a Burning Day , ”[106-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore , seating [himself]106-dumbledore behind [his]106-dumbledore desk . “ [He]1437-it ’s really very handsome most of the time , wonderful red and gold plumage . Fascinating creatures , phoenixes . [They]3024-phoenixes can carry immensely heavy loads , [their]3024-phoenixes tears have healing powers , and [they]3024-phoenixes make highly faithful pets . ”[106-dumbledore]

In the shock of [Fawkes]268-fawkes catching fire , [Harry]84-harry had forgotten what [he]84-harry was there for , but it all came back to [him]84-harry as [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore settled [himself]106-dumbledore in the high chair behind the desk and fixed [Harry]84-harry with [his]106-dumbledore penetrating , light - blue stare .

Before [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore could speak another word , however , the door of [the office]2232-the office flew open with an almighty bang and [Hagrid]91-hagrid burst in , a wild look in [his]91-hagrid eyes , [his]91-hagrid balaclava perched on top of [his]91-hagrid shaggy black head and the dead rooster still swinging from [his]91-hagrid hand .

“ It wasn ’ [Harry]84-harry , [Professor Dumbledore]106-dumbledore ! ”[91-hagrid] said [Hagrid]91-hagrid urgently . “ [I]91-hagrid was talkin ’ ter [him]84-harry seconds before [that kid]3025-that kid was found , [he]84-harry never had time , [sir]2107-sir — ”[91-hagrid]

[Dumbledore]106-dumbledore tried to say something , but [Hagrid]91-hagrid went ranting on , waving the rooster around in [his]91-hagrid agitation , sending feathers everywhere .

“ — it ca n’t ’ve bin [him]84-harry , [I]91-hagrid ’ll swear it in front o ’ [the Ministry o ’ Magic]3027-the ministry o ’ magic if [I]91-hagrid have to — ”[91-hagrid]

“ [Hagrid]91-hagrid , [I]91-hagrid — ”[91-hagrid]

“ — [yeh’ve]91-hagrid got [the wrong boy]3028-the wrong boy , [sir]2107-sir , [I]91-hagrid know [Harry]84-harry never — ”[91-hagrid]

“ [Hagrid]91-hagrid ! ”[106-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore loudly . “ [I]106-dumbledore do not think that [Harry]84-harry attacked [those people]3030-those people . ”[106-dumbledore]

“ Oh , ”[91-hagrid] said [Hagrid]91-hagrid , the rooster falling limply at [his]91-hagrid side . “ Right . [I]91-hagrid ’ll wait outside then , [Headmaster]235-headmaster . ”[91-hagrid]

And [he]91-hagrid stomped out looking embarrassed .

“ [You]106-dumbledore do n’t think it was [me]84-harry , [Professor]2440-professor ? ”[84-harry] [Harry]84-harry repeated hopefully as [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore brushed rooster feathers off [his]106-dumbledore desk .

“ No , [Harry]84-harry , [I]106-dumbledore do n’t , ”[106-dumbledore] said [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore , though [his]106-dumbledore face was somber again . “ But [I]106-dumbledore still want to talk to [you]84-harry . ”[106-dumbledore]

[Harry]84-harry waited nervously while [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore considered [him]84-harry , the tips of [his]106-dumbledore long fingers together .

“ [I]106-dumbledore must ask [you]84-harry , [Harry]84-harry , whether there is anything [you]84-harry ’d like to tell [me]106-dumbledore , ”[106-dumbledore] [he]106-dumbledore said gently . “ Anything at all . ”[106-dumbledore]

[Harry]84-harry did n’t know what to say . [He]84-harry thought of [Malfoy]101-malfoy shouting , “ [You]84-harry ’ll be next , Mudbloods ! ”[101-malfoy] and of the Polyjuice Potion simmering away in [[Moaning Myrtle]230-myrtle ’s bathroom]1293-moaning myrtle ’s bathroom . “ No , ”[84-harry] said [Harry]84-harry . “ There is n’t anything , [Professor]2440-professor ... ”[84-harry]

The double attack on [Justin]180-justin and [Nearly Headless Nick]220-nearly headless nick turned what had hitherto been nervousness into real panic . Curiously , it was [Nearly Headless Nick]220-nearly headless nick ’s fate that seemed to worry [people]2142-people most . What could possibly do that to [a ghost]1445-a ghost ? [people]2142-people asked [each other]392-each other ; what terrible power could harm someone who was already dead ? There was almost a stampede to book seats on [the Hogwarts Express]1448-the hogwarts express so that [students]1014-students could go [home]324-home for Christmas .

“ At this rate , [we]3035-we ’ll be [the only ones left]3036-the only ones left , ”[99-ron] [Ron]99-ron told [Harry]84-harry and [Hermione]100-hermione . “ [Us]3035-we , [Malfoy]101-malfoy , [Crabbe]186-crabbe , and [Goyle]187-goyle . What a jolly holiday it ’s going to be . ”[99-ron]

[Crabbe]186-crabbe and [Goyle]187-goyle , who always did whatever [Malfoy]101-malfoy did , had signed up to stay over the holidays , too . But [Harry]84-harry was glad that [most people]2633-most people were leaving . [He]84-harry was tired of people skirting around [him]84-harry in [the corridors]1157-the corridors , as though [he]84-harry were about to sprout fangs or spit poison ; tired of all the muttering , pointing , and hissing as [he]84-harry passed .

[Fred]110-fred and [George]111-george , however , found all this very funny . [Ginny]128-ginny did n’t find it amusing either .

“ Oh , do n’t , ”[128-ginny] [she]128-ginny wailed every time [Fred]110-fred asked [Harry]84-harry loudly who [he]84-harry was planning to attack next , or when [George]111-george pretended to ward [Harry]84-harry off with a large clove of garlic when [they]1455-they met .

[Harry]84-harry did n’t mind ; it made [him]84-harry feel better that [Fred]110-fred and [George]111-george , at least , thought the idea of [his]84-harry being [[Slytherin]160-slytherin ’s heir]2772-slytherin ’s heir was quite ludicrous . “ It ’s because [he]101-malfoy ’s bursting to say it ’s really [him]101-malfoy , ”[99-ron] said [Ron]99-ron knowingly . “ [You]3041-you know how [he]101-malfoy hates [anyone]2137-anyone beating [him]101-malfoy at anything , and [you]3041-you ’re getting all the credit for [his]101-malfoy dirty work . ”[99-ron]

“ Not for long , ”[100-hermione] said [Hermione]100-hermione in a satisfied tone . “ The Polyjuice Potion ’s nearly ready . [We]113-the weasleys ’ll be getting the truth out of [him]101-malfoy any day now . ”[100-hermione]

At last the term ended , and a silence deep as the snow on [the grounds]336-the grounds descended on [the castle]329-the castle . [Harry]84-harry found [it]1459-it peaceful , rather than gloomy , and enjoyed the fact that [he]84-harry , [Hermione]100-hermione , and [the Weasleys]113-the weasleys had the run of [Gryffindor Tower]45-gryffindor tower , which meant [they]1460-they could play Exploding Snap loudly without bothering [anyone]2137-anyone , and practice dueling in private . [Fred]110-fred , [George]111-george , and [Ginny]128-ginny had chosen to stay at [school]341-school rather than visit [Bill]123-bill in [Egypt]18-egypt with [Mr.]1463-mr. and [Mrs. Weasley]122-mrs. weasley . [Percy]120-percy , who disapproved of what [he]120-percy termed [their]1460-they childish behavior , did n’t spend much time in [the Gryffindor common room]1007-the gryffindor common room . Christmas morning dawned , cold and white . [Harry]84-harry and [Ron]99-ron , [the only ones left in [[their]1467-the only ones left in their dormitory dormitory]1468-their dormitory]1467-the only ones left in their dormitory , were woken very early by [Hermione]100-hermione , who burst in , fully dressed and carrying presents for [them]1467-the only ones left in their dormitory both .

“ Wake up , ”[100-hermione] [she]100-hermione said loudly , pulling back the curtains at the window .

“ [Hermione]100-hermione — [you]100-hermione ’re not supposed to be in [here]2101-here — ”[99-ron] said [Ron]99-ron , shielding [his]99-ron eyes against the light .

“ Merry Christmas to [you]99-ron , too , ”[100-hermione] said [Hermione]100-hermione , throwing [him]99-ron [his]99-ron present . “ [I]100-hermione ’ve been up for nearly an hour , adding more lacewings to the potion . It ’s ready . ”[100-hermione]

[Harry]84-harry sat up , suddenly wide awake .

“ Are [you]100-hermione sure ? ”[84-harry]

“ Positive , ”[100-hermione] said [Hermione]100-hermione , shifting Scabbers the rat so that [she]100-hermione could sit down on the end of [Ron]99-ron ’s four - poster . “ If [we]3044-we ’re going to do it , [I]100-hermione say it should be tonight . ”[100-hermione]

At that moment , [Hedwig]93-hedwig swooped into [the room]374-the room , carrying a very small package in [her]93-hedwig beak .

“ Hello , ”[84-harry] said [Harry]84-harry happily as [she]93-hedwig landed on [his]84-harry bed . “ Are [you]93-hedwig speaking to [me]84-harry again ? ”[84-harry]

[She]93-hedwig nibbled [his]99-ron ear in an affectionate sort of way , which was a far better present than the one that [she]93-hedwig had brought [him]99-ron , which turned out to be from [the Dursleys]87-the dursleys . [They]1470-they had sent [Harry]84-harry a toothpick and a note telling [him]84-harry to find out whether [he]84-harry ’d be able to stay at [Hogwarts]3-hogwarts for the summer vacation , too .

The rest of [Harry]84-harry ’s Christmas presents were far more satisfactory . [Hagrid]91-hagrid had sent [him]84-harry a large tin of treacle toffee , which [Harry]84-harry decided to soften by the fire before eating ; [Ron]99-ron had given [him]84-harry a book called Flying with the Cannons , a book of interesting facts about [[his]84-harry favorite Quidditch team]1471-his favorite quidditch team , and [Hermione]100-hermione had bought [him]84-harry a luxury eagle - feather quill . [Harry]84-harry opened the last present to find a new , hand - knitted sweater from [Mrs. Weasley]122-mrs. weasley and a large plum cake . [He]84-harry read [her]100-hermione card with a fresh surge of guilt , thinking about [[Mr. Weasley]133-mr. weasley ’s car ( which had n’t been seen since its crash with [the Whomping Willow]163-the whomping willow]1472-mr. weasley ’s car ( which had n’t been seen since its crash with the whomping willow ) , and the bout of rule - breaking [he]84-harry and [Ron]99-ron were planning next .

[No one]2243-no one , not even someone dreading taking Polyjuice Potion later , could fail to enjoy Christmas dinner at [Hogwarts]3-hogwarts .

[The Great Hall]331-the great hall looked magnificent . Not only were there a dozen frost - covered Christmas trees and thick streamers of holly and mistletoe crisscrossing the ceiling , but enchanted snow was falling , warm and dry , from the ceiling . [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore led [them]1475-them in a few of [his]106-dumbledore favorite carols , [Hagrid]91-hagrid booming more and more loudly with every goblet of eggnog [he]106-dumbledore consumed . [Percy]120-percy , who had n’t noticed that [Fred]110-fred had bewitched [his]120-percy prefect badge so that it now read “ Pinhead , ”[120-percy] kept asking [them]1475-them all what [they]1475-them were sniggering at . [Harry]84-harry did n’t even care that [Draco Malfoy]101-malfoy was making loud , snide remarks about [his]101-malfoy new sweater from the Slytherin table . [Harry]84-harry and [Ron]99-ron had barely finished [their]1475-them third helpings of Christmas pudding when [Hermione]100-hermione ushered [them]1475-them out of [the hall]393-the hall to finalize [their]1475-them plans for the evening .

“ [We]1475-them still need a bit of [the people [you]3046-you ’re changing into]3045-the people you ’re changing into , ”[100-hermione] said [Hermione]100-hermione matter - of - factly , as though [she]100-hermione were sending [them]1475-them to [the supermarket]1477-the supermarket for laundry detergent . “ And obviously , it ’ll be best if [you]3046-you can get something of [Crabbe]186-crabbe ’s and [[Goyle]187-goyle ’s]3047-goyle ’s ; [they]1475-them ’re [[Malfoy]101-malfoy ’s best friends]3048-malfoy ’s best friends , [he]101-malfoy ’ll tell [them]1475-them anything . “ [I]100-hermione ’ve got it all worked out , ”[100-hermione] [she]100-hermione went on smoothly , ignoring [Harry]84-harry ’s and [Ron]99-ron ’s stupefied faces . [Harry]84-harry and [Ron]99-ron looked incredulously at [each other]392-each other .

“ [Hermione]100-hermione , [I]99-ron do n’t think — ”[99-ron]

“ That could go seriously wrong — ”[100-hermione]

But [Hermione]100-hermione had a steely glint in [her]100-hermione eye not unlike the one [Professor McGonagall]158-professor mcgonagall sometimes had .

“ The potion will be useless without [Crabbe]186-crabbe ’s and [Goyle]187-goyle ’s hair , ”[100-hermione] [she]100-hermione said sternly . “ [You]84-harry do want to investigate [Malfoy]101-malfoy , do n’t [you]84-harry ? ”[100-hermione]

“ Oh , all right , all right , ”[84-harry] said [Harry]84-harry . “ But what about [you]84-harry ? Whose hair are [you]84-harry ripping out ? ”[84-harry]

“ [I]100-hermione ’ve already got mine ! ”[100-hermione] said [Hermione]100-hermione brightly , pulling a tiny bottle out of [her]100-hermione pocket and showing [them]1479-they the single hair inside it . “ Remember [Millicent Bulstrode]261-millicent bulstrode wrestling with [me]100-hermione at [the Dueling Club]65-the dueling club ? [She]261-millicent bulstrode left this on [my]100-hermione robes when [she]261-millicent bulstrode was trying to strangle [me]100-hermione ! When [Hermione]100-hermione had bustled off to check on the Polyjuice Potion again , [Ron]99-ron turned to [Harry]84-harry with a doom - laden expression .

“ Have [you]84-harry ever heard of a plan where so many things could go wrong ? ”[99-ron]

But to [Harry]84-harry ’s and [Ron]99-ron ’s utter amazement , stage one of the operation went just as smoothly as [Hermione]100-hermione had said . [They]1479-they lurked in [the deserted entrance hall]1480-the deserted entrance hall after Christmas tea , waiting for [Crabbe]186-crabbe and [Goyle]187-goyle who had remained alone at the Slytherin table , shoveling down fourth helpings of trifle . [Harry]84-harry had perched the chocolate cakes on the end of the banisters . When [they]1479-they spotted [Crabbe]186-crabbe and [Goyle]187-goyle coming out of [the Great Hall]331-the great hall , [Harry]84-harry and [Ron]99-ron hid quickly behind a suit of armor next to the front door .

“ How thick can [you]1479-they get ? ”[99-ron] [Ron]99-ron whispered ecstatically as [Crabbe]186-crabbe gleefully pointed out the cakes to [Goyle]187-goyle and grabbed [them]1482-them . Grinning stupidly , [they]1479-they stuffed the cakes whole into [their]1479-they large mouths . For a moment , both of [them]1479-they chewed greedily , looks of triumph on [their]1479-they faces . Then , without the smallest change of expression , [they]1479-they both keeled over backward onto the floor .

By far the hardest part was hiding [them]1479-they in [the closet across [the hall]393-the hall]1483-the closet across the hall . Once [they]1479-they were safely stowed among the buckets and mops , [Harry]84-harry yanked out a couple of the bristles that covered [Goyle]187-goyle ’s forehead and [Ron]99-ron pulled out several of [Crabbe]186-crabbe ’s hairs . [They]1479-they also stole [their]1479-they shoes , because [their]1479-they own were far too small for [Crabbe-]269-crabbe- and [Goyle]187-goyle - size feet . Then , still stunned at what [they]1479-they had just done , [they]1479-they sprinted up to [[Moaning Myrtle]230-myrtle ’s bathroom]1293-moaning myrtle ’s bathroom .

[They]1479-they could hardly see for the thick black smoke issuing from [the stall in which [Hermione]100-hermione was stirring [the cauldron]663-the cauldron]1486-the stall in which hermione was stirring the cauldron . Pulling [their]1479-they robes up over [their]1479-they faces , [Harry]84-harry and [Ron]99-ron knocked softly on the door .

“ [Hermione]100-hermione ? ”[99-ron]

[They]1479-they heard the scrape of the lock and [Hermione]100-hermione emerged , shiny - faced and looking anxious . Behind [her]100-hermione [they]1479-they heard the gloop gloop of the bubbling , glutinous potion . Three glass tumblers stood ready on the toilet seat .

“ Did [you]84-harry get them ? ”[100-hermione] [Hermione]100-hermione asked breathlessly .

[Harry]84-harry showed [her]100-hermione [Goyle]187-goyle ’s hair .

“ Good . And [I]100-hermione sneaked these spare robes out of [the laundry]3051-the laundry , ”[100-hermione] [Hermione]100-hermione said , holding up a small sack . “ [You]3052-you ’ll need bigger sizes once [you]3052-you ’re [Crabbe]186-crabbe and [Goyle]187-goyle . ”[100-hermione]

[The three of them]1215-the three of them stared into [the cauldron]663-the cauldron . Close up , the potion looked like thick , dark mud , bubbling sluggishly .

“ [I]100-hermione ’m sure [I]100-hermione ’ve done everything right , ”[100-hermione] said [Hermione]100-hermione , nervously rereading the splotched page of Moste Potente Potions . “ It looks like the book says it should ... once [we]1215-the three of them ’ve drunk it , [we]1215-the three of them ’ll have exactly an hour before [we]1215-the three of them change back into [ourselves]1215-the three of them . ”[100-hermione]

“ Now what ? ”[99-ron] [Ron]99-ron whispered .

“ [We]1215-the three of them separate it into three glasses and add the hairs . ”[99-ron]

[Hermione]100-hermione ladled large dollops of the potion into each of the glasses . Then , [her]100-hermione hand trembling , [she]100-hermione shook [Millicent Bulstrode]261-millicent bulstrode ’s hair out of its bottle into the first glass .

The potion hissed loudly like a boiling kettle and frothed madly . A second later , it had turned a sick sort of yellow .

“ Urgh — essence of Millicent Bulstrode , ”[99-ron] said [Ron]99-ron , eyeing it with loathing . “ Bet it tastes disgusting . ”[99-ron]

“ Add [yours]3053-yours , then , ”[100-hermione] said [Hermione]100-hermione .

[Harry]84-harry dropped [Goyle]187-goyle ’s hair into the middle glass and [Ron]99-ron put [Crabbe]186-crabbe ’s into the last one . Both glasses hissed and frothed : [Goyle]187-goyle ’s turned the khaki color of a booger , [Crabbe]186-crabbe ’s a dark , murky brown .

“ Hang on , ”[84-harry] said [Harry]84-harry as [Ron]99-ron and [Hermione]100-hermione reached for [their]1490-we glasses . “ [We]1490-we ’d better not all drink them in here ... Once [we]1490-we turn into [Crabbe]186-crabbe and [Goyle]187-goyle [we]1490-we wo n’t fit . And [Millicent Bulstrode]261-millicent bulstrode ’s no pixie . ”[99-ron]

“ Good thinking , ”[99-ron] said [Ron]99-ron , unlocking the door . “ [We]1490-we ’ll take [separate stalls]3054-separate stalls . ”[99-ron]

Careful not to spill a drop of [his]84-harry Polyjuice Potion , [Harry]84-harry slipped into [the middle stall]1491-the middle stall .

“ Ready ? ”[84-harry] [he]84-harry called .

“ Ready , ”[99-ron] came [Ron]99-ron ’s and [Hermione]100-hermione ’s voices .

“ One — two — three — ”[100-hermione]

Pinching [his]84-harry nose , [Harry]84-harry drank the potion down in two large gulps . It tasted like overcooked cabbage .

Immediately , [his]84-harry insides started writhing as though [he]84-harry ’d just swallowed live snakes — doubled up , [he]84-harry wondered whether [he]84-harry was going to be sick — then a burning sensation spread rapidly from [his]84-harry stomach to the very ends of [his]84-harry fingers and toes — next , bringing [him]84-harry gasping to all fours , came a horrible melting feeling , as the skin all over [his]84-harry body bubbled like hot wax — and before [his]84-harry eyes , [his]84-harry hands began to grow , the fingers thickened , the nails broadened , the knuckles were bulging like bolts — [his]84-harry shoulders stretched painfully and a prickling on [his]84-harry forehead told [him]84-harry that hair was creeping down toward [his]84-harry eyebrows — [his]84-harry robes ripped as [his]84-harry chest expanded like a barrel bursting its hoops — [his]84-harry feet were agony in shoes four sizes too small —

As suddenly as it had started , everything stopped . [Harry]84-harry lay facedown on the stone - cold floor , listening to [Myrtle]230-myrtle gurgling morosely in the end toilet . With difficulty , [he]84-harry kicked off [his]84-harry shoes and stood up . So this was what it felt like , being [Goyle]187-goyle . [Professor Flitwick]192-professor flitwick buried [his]192-professor flitwick face in [his]192-professor flitwick hands . [Snape]90-snape was looking as though [the first person]1584-the first person to ask [him]90-snape for a Love Potion would be force - fed poison .

“ What [yer]2692-the boy doin’ down here , [Tom]282-riddle ? ”[2692-the boy]

“ It ’s all over , ”[282-riddle] [he]282-riddle said . “ [I]282-riddle ’m going to have to turn [you]2692-the boy in , [Rubeus]284-rubeus . [They]3185-they ’re talking about closing [Hogwarts]3-hogwarts if the attacks do n’t stop . ”[282-riddle]

“ What d’yeh — ”[1657-the large boy]

“ That ’s two Gryffindors down , not counting [a Gryffindor ghost]3238-a gryffindor ghost , [one Ravenclaw]3239-one ravenclaw , and one Hufflepuff , ”[153-lee jordan] said [[the Weasley twins]1729-the weasley twins ’ friend]1730-the weasley twins ’ friend [Lee Jordan]153-lee jordan , counting on [his]153-lee jordan fingers . “ Have n’t [any of [the teachers]2348-the teachers]3240-any of the teachers noticed that [the Slytherins]201-the slytherins are all safe ? [Harry]84-harry had inherited just one thing from [[his]84-harry father]592-his father : a long and silvery Invisibility Cloak . It was [their]1735-they only chance of sneaking out of [the school]760-the school to visit [Hagrid]91-hagrid without [anyone]2137-anyone knowing about it . “ Good evening , [Hagrid]91-hagrid . ”[91-hagrid]

[The stranger]1748-the stranger had rumpled gray hair and an anxious expression , and was wearing a strange mixture of clothes : a pinstriped suit , a scarlet tie , a long black cloak , and pointed purple boots . [Fang]207-fang started howling , scratching at the closed door .

Summer was creeping over [the grounds around [the castle]329-the castle]1753-the grounds around the castle ; sky and lake alike turned periwinkle blue and flowers large as cabbages burst into bloom in [the greenhouses]857-the greenhouses . But with no [Hagrid]91-hagrid visible from the castle windows , striding [the grounds]336-the grounds with [Fang]207-fang at [his]91-hagrid heels , the scene did n’t look right to [Harry]84-harry ; no better , in fact , than the inside of [the castle]329-the castle , where things were so horribly wrong .

[Harry]84-harry and [Ron]99-ron had tried to visit [Hermione]100-hermione , but [visitors]1758-visitors were now barred from [the hospital wing]2447-the hospital wing .

“ [We]1760-we ’re taking no more chances , ”[219-madam pomfrey] [Madam Pomfrey]219-madam pomfrey told [them]1760-we severely through a crack in the infirmary door . “ No , [I]219-madam pomfrey ’m sorry , there ’s every chance [the attacker]1156-the attacker might come back to finish [these people]3292-these people off ... ”[219-madam pomfrey]

With [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore gone , fear had spread as never before , so that the sun warming the castle walls outside seemed to stop at the mullioned windows . There was barely a face to be seen in [the school]760-the school that did n’t look worried and tense , and any laughter that rang through [the corridors]1157-the corridors sounded shrill and unnatural and was quickly stifled .

[Harry]84-harry constantly repeated [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore ’s final words to [himself]84-harry . “ [I]84-harry will only truly have left [this school]2697-this school when [none here]3283-none here are loyal to [me]84-harry ... [Hagrid]91-hagrid ’s hint about the spiders was far easier to understand — the trouble was , there did n’t seem to be a single spider left in [the castle]329-the castle to follow . [Harry]84-harry looked everywhere [he]84-harry went , helped ( rather reluctantly ) by [Ron]99-ron . [They]1763-they were hampered , of course , by the fact that [they]1763-they were n’t allowed to wander off on [their]1763-they own but had to move around [the castle]329-the castle in a pack with [the other Gryffindors]1767-the other gryffindors . [Most of [[their]1763-they fellow students]1769-their fellow students]1768-most of their fellow students seemed glad that [they]1768-most of their fellow students were being shepherded from class to class by [teachers]1741-teachers , but [Harry]84-harry found it very irksome .

[One person]1771-one person , however , seemed to be thoroughly enjoying the atmosphere of terror and suspicion . “ [I]101-malfoy always thought [Father]271-father might be [the one who got rid of [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore]3296-the one who got rid of dumbledore , ”[101-malfoy] [he]101-malfoy said , not troubling to keep [his]101-malfoy voice down . “ [I]101-malfoy told [you]84-harry [he]271-father thinks [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore ’s [the worst headmaster [the school]760-the school ’s ever had]3297-the worst headmaster the school ’s ever had . [Snape]90-snape swept past [Harry]84-harry , making no comment about [Hermione]100-hermione ’s empty seat and cauldron .

“ Now , now , [Malfoy]101-malfoy , ”[90-snape] said [Snape]90-snape , though [he]90-snape could n’t suppress a thin - lipped smile . “ [Professor Dumbledore]106-dumbledore has only been suspended by [the governors]3270-the governors . [Snape]90-snape smirked as [he]90-snape swept off around [the dungeon]1070-the dungeon , fortunately not spotting [Seamus Finnigan]167-seamus , who was pretending to vomit into [his]167-seamus cauldron .

“ [I]101-malfoy ’m quite surprised [the Mudbloods]234-mudbloods have n’t all packed [their]3311-their bags by now , ”[101-malfoy] [Malfoy]101-malfoy went on . “ Bet [you]2107-sir [five Galleons]3312-five galleons [the next one]3313-the next one dies . Pity it was n’t [Granger]100-hermione — ”[101-malfoy]

The bell rang at that moment , which was lucky ; at [Malfoy]101-malfoy ’s last words , [Ron]99-ron had leapt off [his]99-ron stool , and in the scramble to collect bags and books , [his]99-ron attempts to reach [Malfoy]101-malfoy went unnoticed .

“ Let [me]99-ron at [him]99-ron , ”[99-ron] [Ron]99-ron growled as [Harry]84-harry and [Dean]168-dean hung onto [his]99-ron arms . “ [I]99-ron do n’t care , [I]99-ron do n’t need [my]99-ron wand , [I]99-ron ’m going to kill [him]99-ron with [my]99-ron bare hands — ”[99-ron]

[The Gryffindor common room]1007-the gryffindor common room was always very crowded these days , because from six o’clock onward [the Gryffindors]183-the gryffindors had nowhere else to go . [They]183-the gryffindors also had plenty to talk about , with the result that [the common room]835-the common room often did n’t empty until past midnight .

[Harry]84-harry went to get the Invisibility Cloak out of [his]84-harry trunk right after dinner , and spent the evening sitting on it , waiting for [the room]374-the room to clear . [Harry]84-harry and [Ron]99-ron kept losing on purpose , trying to finish the games quickly , but even so , it was well past midnight when [Fred]110-fred , [George]111-george , and [Ginny]128-ginny finally went to bed .

[Harry]84-harry and [Ron]99-ron waited for the distant sounds of two dormitory doors closing before seizing the Cloak , throwing it over [themselves]183-the gryffindors , and climbing through the portrait hole .

[They]183-the gryffindors reached [[Hagrid]91-hagrid ’s house]980-hagrid ’s house , sad and sorry - looking with [its]980-hagrid ’s house blank windows . [Harry]84-harry left the Invisibility Cloak on [Hagrid]91-hagrid ’s table . There would be no need for it in [the pitch - dark forest]1803-the pitch - dark forest .

“ C’m on , [Fang]207-fang , [we]183-the gryffindors ’re going for a walk , ”[84-harry] said [Harry]84-harry , patting [his]84-harry leg , and [Fang]207-fang bounded happily out of [the house]2099-the house behind [them]183-the gryffindors , dashed to the edge of [the forest]976-the forest , and lifted [his]207-fang leg against a large sycamore tree .

[Harry]84-harry took out [his]84-harry wand , murmured , “ Lumos ! ”[84-harry] and a tiny light appeared at the end of it , just enough to let [them]183-the gryffindors watch [the path]1806-the path for signs of spiders .

“ Good thinking , ”[99-ron] said [Ron]99-ron . “ [I]99-ron ’d light [mine]99-ron , too , but [you]84-harry know — it ’d probably blow up or something ... ”[99-ron]

[Harry]84-harry tapped [Ron]99-ron on the shoulder , pointing at the grass . [Two solitary spiders]1807-two solitary spiders were hurrying away from the wandlight into the shade of the trees .

“ Okay , ”[99-ron] [Ron]99-ron sighed as though resigned to the worst , “ [I]99-ron ’m ready . Let ’s go . ”[99-ron]

So , with [Fang]207-fang scampering around [them]183-the gryffindors , sniffing tree roots and leaves , [they]183-the gryffindors entered [the forest]976-the forest . By the glow of [Harry]84-harry ’s wand , [they]183-the gryffindors followed the steady trickle of spiders moving along [the path]1806-the path . [They]183-the gryffindors walked behind [them]183-the gryffindors for about twenty minutes , not speaking , listening hard for noises other than breaking twigs and rustling leaves . Then , when the trees had become thicker than ever , so that the stars overhead were no longer visible , and [Harry]84-harry ’s wand shone alone in the sea of dark , [they]183-the gryffindors saw [their]183-the gryffindors spider guides leaving [the path]1806-the path .

[Harry]84-harry paused , trying to see where the spiders were going , but everything outside [his]84-harry little sphere of light was pitch - black . [He]84-harry had never been this deep into [the forest]976-the forest before . [He]84-harry could vividly remember [Hagrid]91-hagrid advising [him]84-harry not to leave [the forest path]1812-the forest path last time [he]84-harry ’d been in [here]2101-here . But [Hagrid]91-hagrid was miles away now , probably sitting in [a cell in [Azkaban]68-azkaban]1814-a cell in azkaban , and [he]91-hagrid had also said to follow the spiders .

Something wet touched [Harry]84-harry ’s hand and [he]84-harry jumped backward , crushing [Ron]99-ron ’s foot , but it was only [Fang]207-fang ’s nose .

“ What d’you reckon ? ”[84-harry] [Harry]84-harry said to [Ron]99-ron , whose eyes [he]84-harry could just make out , reflecting the light from [his]84-harry wand .

“ [We]1815-they ’ve come this far , ”[99-ron] said [Ron]99-ron .

So [they]1815-they followed the darting shadows of the spiders into the trees . [They]1815-they could n’t move very quickly now ; there were tree roots and stumps in [their]1815-they way , barely visible in the near blackness . [Harry]84-harry could feel [Fang]207-fang ’s hot breath on [his]84-harry hand . [They]1815-they walked for what seemed like at least half an hour , [their]1815-they robes snagging on low - slung branches and brambles . After a while , [they]1815-they noticed that the ground seemed to be sloping downward , though the trees were as thick as ever .

Then [Fang]207-fang suddenly let loose a great , echoing bark , making both [Harry]84-harry and [Ron]99-ron jump out of [their]1815-they skins .

“ There ’s something moving over there , ”[84-harry] [Harry]84-harry breathed . “ Listen ... sounds like something big ... ”[84-harry]

[They]1815-they listened . Some distance to [their]1815-they right , the something big was snapping branches as it carved a path through the trees .

“ Oh , no , ”[99-ron] said [Ron]99-ron . “ Oh , no , oh , no , oh — ”[99-ron]

The darkness seemed to be pressing on [their]1815-they eyeballs as [they]1815-they stood , terrified , waiting . There was a strange rumbling noise and then silence .

[They]1815-they waited , shivering , hardly daring to move .

“ D’you think it ’s gone ? ”[84-harry] [Harry]84-harry whispered .

“ Dunno — ”[84-harry]

Then , to [their]1815-they right , came a sudden blaze of light , so bright in the darkness that [both of [them]1815-they]702-both of them flung up [their]1815-they hands to shield [their]1815-they eyes . [Fang]207-fang yelped and tried to run , but got lodged in a tangle of thorns and yelped even louder .

“ [Harry]84-harry ! ”[99-ron] [Ron]99-ron shouted , [his]99-ron voice breaking with relief . “ [Harry]84-harry , it ’s [[our]1815-they car]3333-our car ! ”[99-ron]
