[Harry]84-harry blundered after [Ron]99-ron toward the light , stumbling and tripping , and a moment later [they]1815-they had emerged into [a clearing]1817-a clearing .

[[Mr. Weasley]133-mr. weasley ’s car]1818-mr. weasley ’s car was standing , empty , in the middle of a circle of thick trees under a roof of dense branches , its headlights ablaze . [Fang]207-fang did n’t seem at all keen on it ; [he]207-fang kept close to [Harry]84-harry , who could feel [him]207-fang quivering . “ And [we]3335-we thought it was going to attack [us]3335-we ! ”[99-ron] said [Ron]99-ron , leaning against [the car]380-the car and patting it . “ [I]99-ron wondered where it had gone ! ”[99-ron]

[Ron]99-ron did n’t speak . [He]99-ron did n’t move . [His]99-ron eyes were fixed on a point some ten feet above [the forest floor]1824-the forest floor , right behind [Harry]84-harry . [His]99-ron face was livid with terror .

[Harry]84-harry did n’t even have time to turn around . There was a loud clicking noise and suddenly [he]99-ron felt something long and hairy seize [him]99-ron around the middle and lift [him]99-ron off the ground , so that [he]99-ron was hanging facedown . Struggling , terrified , [he]99-ron heard more clicking , and saw [Ron]99-ron ’s legs leave the ground , too , heard [Fang]207-fang whimpering and howling — next moment , [he]99-ron was being swept away into the dark trees .

Head hanging , [Harry]84-harry saw that what had hold of [him]99-ron was marching on six immensely long , hairy legs , the front two clutching [him]99-ron tightly below a pair of shining black pincers . Behind [him]99-ron , [he]99-ron could hear another of the creatures , no doubt carrying [Ron]99-ron . [They]1825-they were moving into [the very heart of [the forest]976-the forest]1826-the very heart of the forest . [Harry]84-harry could hear [Fang]207-fang fighting to free [himself]207-fang from a third monster , whining loudly , but [Harry]84-harry could n’t have yelled even if [he]84-harry had wanted to ; [he]84-harry seemed to have left [his]84-harry voice back with [the car]380-the car in [the clearing]1829-the clearing .

[He]84-harry never knew how long [he]84-harry was in the creature ’s clutches ; [he]84-harry only knew that the darkness suddenly lifted enough for [him]84-harry to see that the leaf - strewn ground was now swarming with spiders . Craning [his]84-harry neck sideways , [he]84-harry realized that [they]1825-they had reached [the ridge of [a vast hollow]1831-a vast hollow]1830-the ridge of a vast hollow , [a hollow that had been cleared of trees , so that the stars shone brightly onto the worst scene [he]84-harry had ever laid eyes on]1832-a hollow that had been cleared of trees , so that the stars shone brightly onto the worst scene he had ever laid eyes on .

[Spiders]291-spiders . Not tiny spiders like those surging over the leaves below . Spiders the size of carthorses , eight - eyed , eight - legged , black , hairy , gigantic . The massive specimen that was carrying [Harry]84-harry made its way down the steep slope toward a misty , domed web in [the very center of [the hollow]1834-the hollow]1833-the very center of the hollow , while its fellows closed in all around it , clicking [their]1825-they pincers excitedly at the sight of its load .

[Harry]84-harry fell to the ground on all fours as the spider released [him]84-harry . [Ron]99-ron and [Fang]207-fang thudded down next to [him]84-harry . [Fang]207-fang was n’t howling anymore , but cowering silently on the spot . [Ron]99-ron looked exactly like [Harry]84-harry felt . [His]99-ron mouth was stretched wide in a kind of silent scream and [his]99-ron eyes were popping .

[Harry]84-harry suddenly realized that the spider that had dropped [him]84-harry was saying something . It had been hard to tell , because [he]84-harry clicked [his]84-harry pincers with every word [he]84-harry spoke .

“ Aragog ! ”[84-harry] it called . “ Aragog ! ”[84-harry]

And from the middle of the misty , domed web , a spider the size of a small elephant emerged , very slowly . There was gray in the black of [his]99-ron body and legs , and each of the eyes on [his]99-ron ugly , pincered head was milky white . [He]99-ron was blind .

“ What is it ? ”[84-harry] [he]84-harry said , clicking [his]84-harry pincers rapidly .

“ [Men]3336-men , ”[84-harry] clicked the spider who had caught [Harry]84-harry .

“ Is it [Hagrid]91-hagrid ? ”[292-aragog] said [Aragog]292-aragog , moving closer , [his]292-aragog eight milky eyes wandering vaguely .

“ [Strangers]293-strangers , ”[99-ron] clicked the spider who had brought [Ron]99-ron .

“ Kill [them]293-strangers , ”[292-aragog] clicked [Aragog]292-aragog fretfully . “ [I]292-aragog was sleeping ... ”[292-aragog]

“ [We]3336-men ’re [friends of [Hagrid]91-hagrid ’s]3337-friends of hagrid ’s , ”[84-harry] [Harry]84-harry shouted . [His]84-harry heart seemed to have left [his]84-harry chest to pound in [his]84-harry throat .

[Aragog]292-aragog paused .

[Harry]84-harry thought of getting to [his]84-harry feet but decided against it ; [he]84-harry did n’t think [his]84-harry legs would support [him]84-harry . So [he]84-harry spoke from the ground , as calmly as [he]84-harry could .

“ [They]3340-they think , up at [the school]760-the school , that [Hagrid]91-hagrid ’s been setting a — a — something on [students]1014-students . [They]3340-they ’ve taken [him]91-hagrid to [Azkaban]68-azkaban . ”[84-harry]

[Aragog]292-aragog clicked [his]292-aragog pincers furiously , and all around [the hollow]1834-the hollow the sound was echoed by [the crowd of spiders]1838-the crowd of spiders ; it was like applause , except applause did n’t usually make [Harry]84-harry feel sick with fear .

“ But that was years ago , ”[292-aragog] said [Aragog]292-aragog fretfully . “ Years and years ago . [I]292-aragog remember it well . [They]3340-they thought that [Hagrid]91-hagrid had opened [the Chamber]2752-the chamber and set [me]292-aragog free . ”[292-aragog]

“ And [you]292-aragog ... [you]292-aragog did n’t come from [the Chamber of Secrets]1124-the chamber of secrets ? ”[84-harry] said [Harry]84-harry , who could feel cold sweat on [his]84-harry forehead .

Of the many fearsome beasts and monsters that roam [[our]1909-our land]1910-our land , there is none more curious or more deadly than the Basilisk , known also as [the King of Serpents]1911-the king of serpents . This snake , which may reach gigantic size and live many hundreds of years , is born from a chicken ’s egg , hatched beneath a toad . [He]282-riddle cast an amused eye over [Fawkes]268-fawkes and the Sorting Hat , then walked away . [Harry]84-harry wheeled around to look up at the statue , [Fawkes]268-fawkes swaying on [his]84-harry shoulder .

[Harry]84-harry backed away until [he]84-harry hit the dark Chamber wall , and as [he]84-harry shut [his]84-harry eyes tight [he]84-harry felt [Fawkes]268-fawkes ’ wing sweep [his]84-harry cheek as [he]84-harry took flight . [Harry]84-harry wanted to shout , “ Do n’t leave [me]84-harry ! ”[84-harry] but what chance did [a phoenix]1995-a phoenix have against [the king of serpents]1911-the king of serpents ?

Something huge hit the stone floor of [the Chamber]2752-the chamber . [Harry]84-harry felt it shudder — [he]84-harry knew what was happening , [he]84-harry could sense it , could almost see the giant serpent uncoiling [itself]160-slytherin from [Slytherin]160-slytherin ’s mouth . Then [he]84-harry heard [Riddle]282-riddle ’s hissing voice :

“ Kill [him]160-slytherin . ”[282-riddle]

The basilisk was moving toward [Harry]84-harry ; [he]84-harry could hear its heavy body slithering heavily across the dusty floor . Eyes still tightly shut , [Harry]84-harry began to run blindly sideways , [his]84-harry hands outstretched , feeling [his]84-harry way — [Voldemort]94-lord voldemort was laughing —

[Harry]84-harry tripped . [He]84-harry fell hard onto the stone and tasted blood — the serpent was barely feet from [him]84-harry , [he]84-harry could hear it coming —

There was a loud , explosive spitting sound right above [him]84-harry , and then something heavy hit [Harry]84-harry so hard that [he]84-harry was smashed into the wall . Waiting for fangs to sink through [his]84-harry body , [he]84-harry heard more mad hissing , something thrashing wildly off the pillars —

[He]84-harry could n’t help it — [he]84-harry opened [his]84-harry eyes wide enough to squint at what was going on .

The enormous serpent , bright , poisonous green , thick as an oak trunk , had raised itself high in the air and its great blunt head was weaving drunkenly between the pillars . As [Harry]84-harry trembled , ready to close [his]84-harry eyes if it turned , [he]84-harry saw what had distracted the snake .

[Fawkes]268-fawkes was soaring around its head , and the basilisk was snapping furiously at [him]84-harry with fangs long and thin as sabers —

[Fawkes]268-fawkes dived . [His]268-fawkes long golden beak sank out of sight and a sudden shower of dark blood spattered the floor . The snake ’s tail thrashed , narrowly missing [Harry]84-harry , and before [Harry]84-harry could shut [his]84-harry eyes , [it]1998-its turned — [Harry]84-harry looked straight into [its]1998-its face and saw that [its]1998-its eyes , both its great , bulbous yellow eyes , had been punctured by the phoenix ; blood was streaming to the floor , and the snake was spitting in agony .

“ NO ! ”[282-riddle] [Harry]84-harry heard [Riddle]282-riddle screaming . “ LEAVE [THE BIRD]304-the bird ! [LEAVE THE BIRD]304-the bird ! THE BOY IS BEHIND [YOU]84-harry ! [YOU]84-harry CAN STILL SMELL [HIM]304-the bird ! KILL [HIM]304-the bird ! ”[282-riddle]

[The blinded serpent]1999-the blinded serpent swayed , confused , still deadly . [Fawkes]268-fawkes was circling its head , piping [his]268-fawkes eerie song , jabbing here and there at its scaly nose as the blood poured from its ruined eyes .

“ Help [me]84-harry , help [me]84-harry , ”[84-harry] [Harry]84-harry muttered wildly , “ [someone]388-someone — [anyone]2137-anyone — ”[84-harry]

The snake ’s tail whipped across the floor again . [Harry]84-harry ducked . Something soft hit [his]84-harry face .

The basilisk had swept the Sorting Hat into [Harry]84-harry ’s arms . [Harry]84-harry seized [it]2000-it . It was all [he]84-harry had left , [his]84-harry only chance — [he]84-harry rammed it onto [his]84-harry head and threw [himself]84-harry flat onto the floor as the basilisk ’s tail swung over [him]84-harry again .

Help [me]0-me — help [me]0-me — [Harry]84-harry thought , [his]84-harry eyes screwed tight under the hat . Please help [me]0-me —

There was no answering voice . Instead , the hat contracted , as though an invisible hand was squeezing it very tightly .

Something very hard and heavy thudded onto the top of [Harry]84-harry ’s head , almost knocking [him]84-harry out . Stars winking in front of [his]84-harry eyes , [he]84-harry grabbed the top of the hat to pull it off and felt something long and hard beneath it .

A gleaming silver sword had appeared inside the hat , its handle glittering with rubies the size of eggs .

“ KILL [THE BOY]2692-the boy ! LEAVE [THE BIRD]304-the bird ! [THE BOY]2692-the boy IS BEHIND [YOU]84-harry ! [SNIFF]305-sniff — SMELL [HIM]2692-the boy ! ”[84-harry]

[Harry]84-harry was on [his]84-harry feet , ready . The basilisk ’s head was falling , its body coiling around , hitting pillars as it twisted to face [him]84-harry . [He]84-harry could see the vast , bloody eye sockets , see the mouth stretching wide , wide enough to swallow [him]84-harry whole , lined with fangs long as [his]84-harry sword , thin , glittering , venomous —

[It]2001-it lunged blindly — [Harry]84-harry dodged and it hit the Chamber wall . [It]2001-it lunged again , and its forked tongue lashed [Harry]84-harry ’s side . [He]84-harry raised the sword in both [his]84-harry hands —

The basilisk lunged again , and this time its aim was true — [Harry]84-harry threw [his]84-harry whole weight behind the sword and drove it to the hilt into the roof of the serpent ’s mouth —

But as warm blood drenched [Harry]84-harry ’s arms , [he]84-harry felt a searing pain just above [his]84-harry elbow . One long , poisonous fang was sinking deeper and deeper into [his]84-harry arm and it splintered as the basilisk keeled over sideways and fell , twitching , to the floor .

[Harry]84-harry slid down the wall . [He]84-harry gripped the fang that was spreading poison through [his]84-harry body and wrenched it out of [his]84-harry arm . But [he]84-harry knew it was too late . White - hot pain was spreading slowly and steadily from the wound . Even as [he]84-harry dropped the fang and watched [his]84-harry own blood soaking [his]84-harry robes , [his]84-harry vision went foggy . [The Chamber]2752-the chamber was dissolving in a whirl of dull color .

A patch of scarlet swam past , and [Harry]84-harry heard a soft clatter of claws beside [him]84-harry .

“ [Fawkes]268-fawkes , ”[84-harry] said [Harry]84-harry thickly . “ [You]268-fawkes were fantastic , [Fawkes]268-fawkes ... ”[84-harry] [He]84-harry felt the bird lay its beautiful head on the spot where the serpent ’s fang had pierced [him]84-harry .

[He]84-harry could hear echoing footsteps and then a dark shadow moved in front of [him]84-harry .

“ [You]84-harry ’re dead , [Harry Potter]84-harry , ”[282-riddle] said [Riddle]282-riddle ’s voice above [him]84-harry . “ Dead . [Even Dumbledore]107-dumbledore ’s bird knows it . Do [you]84-harry see what [he]268-fawkes ’s doing , [Potter]84-harry ? [He]268-fawkes ’s crying . ”[282-riddle]

[Harry]84-harry blinked . [Fawkes]268-fawkes ’s head slid in and out of focus . Thick , pearly tears were trickling down the glossy feathers .

“ [I]282-riddle ’m going to sit here and watch [you]84-harry die , [Harry Potter]84-harry . Take [your]84-harry time . [I]282-riddle ’m in no hurry . ”[282-riddle]

[Harry]84-harry felt drowsy . Everything around [him]84-harry seemed to be spinning .

“ So ends [the famous Harry Potter]84-harry , ”[282-riddle] said [Riddle]282-riddle ’s distant voice . “ Alone in [the Chamber of Secrets]76-the chamber of secrets , forsaken by [[his]268-fawkes friends]2162-his friends , defeated at last by [the Dark Lord]105-the dark lord [he]268-fawkes so unwisely challenged . If this is dying , thought [Harry]84-harry , it ’s not so bad .

[He]282-riddle raised the wand —

Then , in a rush of wings , [Fawkes]268-fawkes had soared back overhead and something fell into [Harry]84-harry ’s lap — the diary .

Then , without thinking , without considering , as though [he]84-harry had meant to do it all along , [Harry]84-harry seized the basilisk fang on the floor next to [him]84-harry and plunged it straight into the heart of the book .

There was a long , dreadful , piercing scream . Ink spurted out of the diary in torrents , streaming over [Harry]84-harry ’s hands , flooding the floor . [Riddle]282-riddle was writhing and twisting , screaming and flailing and then —

[He]282-riddle had gone . [Harry]84-harry ’s wand fell to the floor with a clatter and there was silence . Silence except for the steady drip drip of ink still oozing from the diary . The basilisk venom had burned a sizzling hole right through it .

Shaking all over , [Harry]84-harry pulled [himself]84-harry up . [His]84-harry head was spinning as though [he]84-harry ’d just traveled miles by Floo powder . “ It was this diary , ”[84-harry] said [Harry]84-harry quickly , picking it up and showing it to [Dumbledore]106-dumbledore . “ [Riddle]307-riddle wrote it when [he]307-riddle was sixteen ... ”[84-harry]

[Dumbledore]106-dumbledore took the diary from [Harry]84-harry and peered keenly down [his]106-dumbledore long , crooked nose at its burnt and soggy pages .

“ Brilliant , ”[106-dumbledore] [he]106-dumbledore said softly . “ Of course , [he]307-riddle was probably [the most brilliant student [Hogwarts]95-hogwarts has ever seen]3588-the most brilliant student hogwarts has ever seen . ”[106-dumbledore] [He]106-dumbledore turned around to [the Weasleys]113-the weasleys , who were looking utterly bewildered .

“ [Very few people]3589-very few people know that [Lord Voldemort]94-lord voldemort was once called [Tom Riddle]282-riddle . [I]106-dumbledore taught [him]307-riddle [myself]106-dumbledore , fifty years ago , at [Hogwarts]3-hogwarts . [He]307-riddle disappeared after leaving [the school]760-the school ... traveled far and wide ... sank so deeply into the Dark Arts , consorted with the very worst of [our]113-the weasleys kind , underwent so many dangerous , magical transformations , that when [he]307-riddle resurfaced as [Lord Voldemort]94-lord voldemort , [he]307-riddle was barely recognizable . [Harry]84-harry had been to several Hogwarts feasts , but never one quite like this . [Everybody]786-everybody was in [their]786-everybody pajamas , and the celebration lasted all night .
